ygData.subject: Re: Sorry.
ygData.msgSnippet: Very good Logo I am impressed, but being somewhat Stubborn as you put it Lunarpine prefers the natural side of things, and with such a lack in personel around

Very good Logo I am impressed, but being somewhat "Stubborn as you 
put it Lunarpine prefers the natural side of things, and with such a 
lack in personel around the ark he figures his sight a little thing 
compared to cybertrons history as they know it. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> OOC:( Real dogs and wolves see in black and white.  But a bot who 
> used to see in color, may pose a problem.  This means any one 
wearing 
> mottled camoflage can sneak up on Lunarpine, like a hunter to a 
dear, 
> and get him.  IRL nature has little to do with being a bot.  Animal 
> shape, instincts and the need to hunt are one thing.  But as far as 
> the physical machanics of a BeastWars tranformer, color sight is 
> superior to black and white vision. So there.)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > If you're such a nature buff then you should know why Lunarpine's 
> > satisfied being colorblind.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > OOC:( Oh boy, I feel sorry for you then.  I shall call you as 
you 
> > > have requested Soulstice. I got the name for my email from the 
> > > reclassification of a rabbit.  Rabbits and hares are no longer 
> > > classified as rodents, but as logomorphs.  That's how I came up 
> > with 
> > > my email. OK, so I'm a nature buff. Sue me)
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > > > One thing, though, please stop calling me the Code! The name 
is 
> > > SOULSTICE,
> > > > this is my only e-mail adress and I prefer that nobody calls 
me 
> > > that,
> > > > because I didn't get to choose my e-mail adress, my mom did, 
> heh 
> > > heh...

be
